title: Sorgame Endralum Lyrics Ooru Vittu ooru Vanthu
stanzas: <div>Sorgame Endralum Song Lyrics Ooru Vittu ooru Vanthu

Sorgame Endraalum
adhu nammoora pola varuma
ada ennaadu endraalum
adhu nam naatuku eedaaguma

pala dhesam muzhuthum
pesum mozhigal
Tamizh pol inithidumaa..

Sorgame Endraalum
adhu nammoora pola varuma
ada ennaadu endraalum
adhu nam naatuku eedaaguma

aerikarai paattum
yaelaelaelo paattum
ingae yedhum ketkavillaiye

paadum kuyil saaththam
aadum mayil niththam
paakka oru solai illaiye

veththalaiya madichu
maaman adha kadichu
thuppa oru vazhi illaiye

oadi vandhu kudhichu
mungi mungi kulichi
aada oru oadai illaiye

ivvooru enna ooru
nammooru romba maelu
ada odum pala caru
enna aadambaram paaru

oru thaagam theerkka
yaedhu moru

Sorgame Endraalum
adhu nammoora pola varuma
ada ennaadu endraalum
adhu nam naatuku eedaaguma

pala dhesam muzhuthum
pesum mozhigal
Tamizh pol inithidumaa..

Sorgame Endraalum
adhu nammoora pola varuma
ada ennaadu endraalum
adhu nam naatuku eedaaguma

maadu kanu maekka
maeyiradha paakka
mandha veli ingu illaiye

aadupuli aattam
poatu vilaiyaada
arasa maram
maedai illaiye

kaala rendu pootti
katta vandi oati
gaanam paada
vazhi illaiye

tholigala alaichi
solli solli rasichi
attam poda mudiyalaiye

oru endhiratha pola
ada ingae ulla vazhka
idha engae poyi solla
manam ishta padavilla

nammoora pola
oorum illa.

Sorgame Endraalum
adhu nammoora pola varuma
ada ennaadu endraalum
adhu nam naatuku eedaaguma

pala dhesam muzhuthum
pesum mozhigal
Tamizh pol inithidumaa..

Sorgame Endraalum
adhu nammoora pola varuma
ada ennaadu endraalum
adhu nam naatuku eedaaguma
